text: phir tumase pahale jo naslen guzar chukee hai unamen aise bhale-samajhadaar kyon na hue jo dharatee mein bigaad se rokate, un thode-se logon ke siva jinako unamen se hamane bacha liya. atyaachaaree log to usee sukh-saamagree ke peechhe pade rahe, jisamen ve rakhe gae the. ve to the hee aparaadhee
